staticWindow.title: Techincal Overview:
staticWindow.subtitle: Adding modality to static Kendo Window components.
points: The application turns windows into modals by using a Kendo overlay, using the .k-overlay class on a global div element that is enabled when the first window is opened.
When a child window is opened, the parent window is moved behind the the overlay by making the z-index styling less than the z-index applied to the .k-overlay class.
All click events on the overlay and turned off, as well as on all child windows, applying the following styling: pointer-events: none;.
